    • Uses of IBlockAccess in net.minecraft.src.forge

      Methods in net.minecraft.src.forge with parameters of type IBlockAccess 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean IConnectRedstone.canConnectRedstone(IBlockAccess world, int X, int Y, int Z, int direction)
      When this returns false, the block at location i, j, k cannot make a redstone connection in the direction given in parameter, otherwise it can.
